component.name: v2raya-flatpak
component.summary: A web GUI client of Project V which supports VMess, VLESS, SS, SSR, Trojan and Pingtunnel protocols

description.p: v2rayA is a V2Ray client supporting global transparent proxy on Linux and system proxy on Windows and macOS, it is compatible with SS, SSR, Trojan(trojan-go), Tuic and Juicity protocols.
